name: Huff N Puff
description:
How to play:

Click on your air vessel to see where you can go (it is your range of movement), then click on a highlighted hexagon to move.

Click on the enemy's vessel to aim it, then solve the slide bars minigame, hitting the center of the first and the top of the second one.

Clouds can reduce damage.

The map will shrink during the match.
